reference: DeLong, J.B. and L. Summers, Are Business Cycles Symmetric? Harvard University mimeo, 1985.

Diebold, F.X. and G.D. Rudebusch, Does the Business Cycle have Duration Memory? Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, Division of Research and Statistics, Special Studies Paper No. 223, August 1987.

Feller, W., An Introduction to Probability Theory and its Applications, vol. 1, 3rd edition, New York, John Wiley, 1968.
Hamilton, J.D., A New Approach to the Economic Analysis of Nonstationary Time Series and the Business Cycle, University of Virginia mimeo, July 1987.
